item.title: The Tech Scratchpad

item.description: ‚Ä¶ Back to 2024 BSides Vegas and DefCon ‚Ä¶ www.youtube.com/watch William Taylor‚Äôs talk on AWS Transit Gateways was a perfect case study in the gap between design and reality.

item.title: Voter village talk with secretary of state new hampshire Saturday at 2-07 PM
item.description: ‚Ä¶ Back to 2024 BSides Vegas and DefCon ‚Ä¶ The talk centers around the importance of election security and voter confidence in the United States, specifically highlighting the speaker‚Äôs experiences as the Secretary of State in New Hampshire.

item.title: Breaching AWS accounts through shadow resources Friday 227 PM
item.description: ‚Ä¶ Back to 2024 BSides Vegas and DefCon ‚Ä¶ www.youtube.com/watch This talk on ‚ÄúShadow Resources‚Äù was an interesting look into how AWS services can create predictable S3 buckets behind the scenes, which can then be taken over by an attacker.
